data.title: Hard Boiled at Cinema Salem
data.meta_description: Night Light presents a series of classic and contemporary cult films from around the world on the second and fourth Friday of every month.--------------------------------------------------------------A cop who loses his partner in a shoot-out with gun smugglers goes on a mission to catch them. In order to get closer to the leaders of the ring he joins forces with an undercover cop who's working as a gangster hitman. They use all means of excessive force to find them. 1992/Hong Kong/Directed by John Woo
data.text:
Hard Boiled

128 mins | Rated R | Action
